## ReadableEthersMosaic.getMSICStake() method

Get the current state of an MSIC Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMSICStake(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<MSICStake>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address that owns the MSIC Stake. |
|  overrides | [EthersCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) |  |
